Actions.Name: Ban From the Shop
Actions.Mark: While marked, if they end their turn in the shop's aura, they take [D]+[fray] divine damage.

Actions.Name: Chastise
Actions.Effects: A character in range 6 takes 1 piercing damage. If that character attacks before the end of their next turn, they take [D] piercing damage and this effect ends.

Actions.Name: Open Shop
Actions.Description: The Shopkeep opens their shop, a size 1 object summoning it in an adjacent space. It lasts until the shopkeep is defeated or this ability is used again.

Summons.Name: Shop
SummonEffects: No fighting in the shop. Aura 1. Characters in the area are pacified+.
While the shop is active, any character in the aura can use the Rummage action, which ignores pacified.

ListedActions.Name: Rummage
ListedActions.Description: The character rummages in the shop and throws something at a foe in range 3. Roll 1d6.

Rolls.Name: 10 Foot Pole
Rolls.Description: The target takes 2 damage and is shoved 2.

Rolls.Name: Lantern
Rolls.Description: The target takes [fray] damage and becomes electrified.

Rolls.Name: Ration
Rolls.Description: The target takes 1 damage. Place the ration in an adjacent space. A character can eat it by entering its space and using 1 action to gain vigor 1.

Rolls.Name: Bomb
Rolls.Description: Blast 1 area effect centered on the target, deals [D]+[fray] damage and inflicts burning.

Rolls.Name: Strange Mushroom
Rolls.Description: The target takes [fray] damage, becomes poisoned and branded.
